'''''Genshin Symphony''''' is the blue-ray video CD recording of the [[Genshin Concert/2023 Genshin Symphony|Genshin Symphony]] concert in Yokohama, Japan, on February 11, 2023. The concert was performed by Tokyo Philharmonic Orchestra and organized by Sony Music Solutions Inc., featuring covers of several [[soundtrack]]s of ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

The physical recording was released on September 6, 2023.
